data.title: Mirskey Collection of Salon Orchestra and Silent Film Music @ Pitt
data.meta_description: Information about the history, contents, and usage of the Mirskey Collection.
data.text:
Cieślak-Krupa, Agnieszka. “A Kiss for Cinderella (1925): The Importance of Historical Accuracy in Reconstructing Scores to Silent Films Based on the Mirskey Collection." Musicology Today 19, no. 1 (December 2022): 73-85. https://doi.org/doi:10.2478/muso-2022-0005.​

Cieślak, Agnieszka. "Bronisław Mirski - Polish Music Director of the Silent Film Era." Musicology Today 17, no. 1 (December 2020): 72-83. https://doi.org/doi:10.2478/muso-2020-0006.​

Magee, Gayle, ed. "Silent Film Music." Special issue, American Music 36, no. 1 (Spring 2018).​ https://www.jstor.org/stable/10.5406/americanmusic.36.issue-1

Peña, Carlos E. "Photoplay Music from the Mirskey Collection at the University of Pittsburgh." Notes 70, no. 3 (March 2014): 398-412. https://doi.org/10.1353/not.2014.0018
